# Process Automation

## Quick Start

This skill helps you automate RevOps workflows. For complete guides, see the [Complete Guide](references/guide.md).

## Execution Checklist

### Automating a Workflow

- [ ] Map current manual process
- [ ] Identify automation opportunities
- [ ] Choose tool (Zapier, Make, native)
- [ ] Build workflow (triggers → actions)
- [ ] Test with sample data
- [ ] Deploy to production
- [ ] Monitor and optimize
- [ ] Document for team

## Common Automations

- **Lead Routing**: New lead → Assign to rep based on criteria
- **Data Enrichment**: New contact → Enrich from Clearbit/ZoomInfo
- **Slack Alerts**: Deal won → notify team in Slack
- **Task Creation**: Stage change → create follow-up task

## Quick Wins

- Automate lead routing (save 2 hours/week)
- Auto-enrich new contacts (improve data quality)
- Slack notifications for key events
- Auto-update deal stages based on activity
